title: Syrian colonel from Assad regime handed life sentence for crimes against humanity
content:
1. Syrian colonel from Assad regime handed life sentence for crimes against humanity  CNN
  2. German court finds Syrian colonel guilty of crimes against humanity  BBC News

  4. Anwar Raslan convicted of crimes against humanity for Syria war, gets life in prison  The Washington Post
  5. German court finds main suspect guilty of crimes against humanity in landmark Syria torture trial  NBC News
